There are 24 - 12 on the top row, 12 on the bottom row - so you might want to count it again.. if you are refering to the fact that "Nobushige" is listed twice, that is because two generals had that name, Takeda Nobushige and Oyamada Nobushige.


>>>Question again: Is it just me or are there only twenty-three generals 
listed on the 24 generals shirt or is Takeda Shingen himself considered one of 
the famous XXIV?  (In other words, is it twenty four including or in addition 
to Shingen?)  Thanx.  :-D

Later
Tim
